nodes.title: Using Prompts for AI
nodes.desc: The practice of designing and utilizing text-based inputs to elicit specific responses from artificial intelligence models. [More Info](https://www.promptingguide.ai/)

nodes.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
nodes.desc: A subfield of artificial intelligence that deals with the interaction between computers and humans in natural language. [More Info](https://www.nltk.org/book/)

nodes.title: Dependency Parsing
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to analyze the grammatical structure of sentences. [More Info](https://www.spacy.io/models)

nodes.title: Semantic Role Labeling (SRL)
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to identify and classify the roles played by entities in a sentence. [More Info](https://www.srl.io/)

nodes.title: Coreference Resolution
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to identify and classify the relationships between entities in text. [More Info](https://www.coref.io/)

nodes.title: Machine Learning
nodes.desc: A type of artificial intelligence that involves training models on data to make predictions or decisions. [More Info](https://www.tensorflow.org/)

nodes.title: Deep Learning
nodes.desc: A type of machine learning that involves training neural networks on large amounts of data. [More Info](https://www.deeplearning.ai/)

nodes.title: Reinforcement Learning
nodes.desc: A type of machine learning that involves training models to make decisions based on rewards or penalties. [More Info](https://www.reinforcementlearning.org/)

nodes.title: Transfer Learning
nodes.desc: A type of machine learning that involves using pre-trained models as a starting point for new tasks. [More Info](https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/transfer_learning)

nodes.title: Language Model
nodes.desc: A type of artificial intelligence model trained on vast amounts of text data to generate human-like language. [More Info](https://huggingface.co/models)

nodes.title: Prompt Engineering
nodes.desc: The process of designing and optimizing text-based inputs to achieve specific goals with AI models. [More Info](https://www.promptingguide.ai/prompt-engineering)

nodes.title: Conversational AI
nodes.desc: A type of AI designed to engage in natural-sounding conversations with humans. [More Info](https://www.conversica.com/)

nodes.title: Text Generation
nodes.desc: The ability of AI models to generate human-like text based on a given prompt or input. [More Info](https://www.textgenrnn.com/)

nodes.title: Question Answering
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to answer questions based on a given text or prompt. [More Info](https://www.squad.io/)

nodes.title: Sentiment Analysis
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to analyze and understand human emotions and sentiment. [More Info](https://www.sentiment140.com/)

nodes.title: Named Entity Recognition (NER)
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to identify and classify named entities in text. [More Info](https://www.spacy.io/models)

nodes.title: Part-of-Speech (POS) Tagging
nodes.desc: A type of NLP task that involves training AI models to identify and classify the parts of speech in text. [More Info](https://www.nltk.org/book/ch05.html)
